message: I'm excited to offer you this exclusive product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to let it go for $1,200,000.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but that price is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to offer $800,000.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1,100,000.
I'm getting closer to what I can afford. How about $900,000?
I'm still not comfortable with $900,000, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I can offer it to you for $1,050,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, you said that was your final offer, but I'm hoping we can still find a middle ground. I'd be willing to pay $950,000.  Let me know if that works for you.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $1,050,000, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a one-year warranty and a premium support package. The price remains at $1,050,000.
